title: Medicinal Herb Seeds
description: Raise these plants for eating, cooking, drying, medicinal purposes, in tinctures, salves, soaps and more. A nice addition to the wild or cottage garden.
cleaned_text: All packets contain 100+ seeds unless otherwise stated. Check out our new fast selling book, Medicinal Herbs to Know and Grow, in our Book Section!
